topic_name: Green iron exports (DRI, HBI, hot metal, ESF pathways)
constraint_summary: Firmed power, low-cost hydrogen, and long-term offtake
justification: Largest export uplift with strong strategic leverage and existing ore dominance

topic_name: Green aluminium (low-carbon alumina plus renewable-powered smelting, alloys)
justification: Australia has strong bauxite and alumina adjacency with premium low-carbon upside

topic_name: Copper upgrading (refining plus semi-fab: rod, wire, foil)
constraint_summary: Scale economics and reliable concentrate feed
justification: Direct value uplift from concentrate exports into strategic copper products

topic_name: Rare earth separation to oxides (NdPr, Dy, Tb)
justification: High leverage in magnet supply chains with clear strategic demand

topic_name: Permanent magnets (NdFeB): metals, alloys, magnet manufacturing
justification: Captures more value than oxide exports and increases geopolitical relevance

topic_name: Battery-grade lithium chemicals (hydroxide, carbonate where viable)
justification: Builds downstream value on top of established spodumene position

topic_name: Silicon metal at scale (metallurgical silicon)
justification: Strategic intermediate feeding multiple export chains

topic_name: Graphite anode materials (purified spherical graphite, coated anode)
constraint_summary: Purification route, qualification, and feedstock contracts
justification: High-value battery bottleneck with credible regional demand

topic_name: Fertilisers and ag-inputs (potash, phosphate, finished fertilisers; low-carbon ammonia integration)
justification: Exportable products with strategic food-system relevance

topic_name: Green chemical feedstocks at scale (ammonia, methanol)
constraint_summary: Renewable energy cost and shipping economics
justification: Large market depth and strong adjacency to hub development

topic_name: Manganese upgrading (battery and alloying chemicals, EMM and HPMSM pathways)
constraint_summary: Process route selection and market qualification
justification: Turns ore advantage into higher-value battery and alloy products

topic_name: Antimony (oxide and metal refining)
justification: Disproportionate strategic leverage due defence and industrial concentration risk

topic_name: High-purity alumina and specialty alumina products
constraint_summary: Purity control and long qualification timelines
justification: Strong alumina adjacency supports specialty export move

topic_name: Nickel and cobalt sulphates (battery-grade)
constraint_summary: Volatile input pricing and quality control
justification: Logical downstream step into battery precursor markets

topic_name: Cathode materials: pCAM and CAM
justification: High value-add opportunity where trusted supply is rewarded

topic_name: Vanadium chemicals and electrolyte for flow batteries and long-duration storage
constraint_summary: Demand scale uncertainty and process economics
justification: Strategic niche aligned with long-duration storage demand

topic_name: Selenium and tellurium recovery (copper refining byproducts)
justification: Byproduct recovery improves copper chain value and resilience

topic_name: Gallium recovery and refining (byproduct-led strategy)
justification: High strategic significance with byproduct-led pathway

topic_name: Germanium recovery and refining (byproduct-led strategy)
constraint_summary: Feedstock concentration and small market scale
justification: Strategically important for electronics though scale and readiness are lower

topic_name: Tungsten intermediates and powders (APT, metal powders)
justification: High-value defence-linked material with feasible processing pathways

topic_name: Tin refining and solder-grade products
justification: Electronics relevance and practical refining pathway

topic_name: Lithium beyond hydroxide: lithium metal, electrolyte salts (LiPF6), specialty lithium chemicals
constraint_summary: Technology transfer and strict quality control
justification: High upside extension but lower near-term readiness

topic_name: Fluorine and phosphate reagent chains (explicit gating sub-platform)
justification: Critical gating inputs for battery and specialty value chains

topic_name: Industrial reagents platform (acids, caustic, soda ash, lime) tied to hubs
constraint_summary: Hub scale coordination and infrastructure siting
justification: Cross-chain enabler that materially de-risks multiple anchors

topic_name: Strategic logistics and certified supply ports (QA labs, blending, dedicated terminals, inventory)
justification: Certified logistics can lock in trusted supplier advantage

topic_name: Traceability, certification, MRV, and product passports (market access infrastructure)
justification: Market-access layer needed to capture low-carbon premiums

topic_name: Mining services and EPC export (modular processing plants, commissioning, maintenance)
constraint_summary: Capability aggregation and global market access
justification: Exportable services can scale faster than new mines or smelters

topic_name: Industrial CCS hubs and CO2 transport and storage (protect export competitiveness)
constraint_summary: Transport and storage regulation plus economics
justification: Defensive priority for maintaining competitiveness in hard-to-abate chains

topic_name: Green premium market infrastructure (offtake structuring, trading, price discovery, long-term contracting)
justification: Commercial architecture is required to monetise differentiated products

topic_name: Firmed clean power platform for industry (generation, transmission, storage, power quality)
constraint_summary: Transmission build pace and system reliability
justification: Foundational enabler for almost all low-carbon processing pathways

topic_name: Ore upgrading and beneficiation as a service (pelletisation, impurity removal, other ores)
justification: Near-term value uplift through grade improvement and impurity management

topic_name: Precision metallurgical testing, certification labs, and reference material production
justification: Build-now capability with broad leverage across the portfolio

topic_name: Industrial control software and optimisation for processing and green metals (exportable capability)
constraint_summary: Data access and integration with plant systems
justification: Scalable exportable capability but monetisation pathways vary by sector

topic_name: Hydrogen production and industrial clean energy inputs (primarily as enabler)
constraint_summary: Delivered hydrogen cost and infrastructure sequence
justification: Important enabler but deployment timing differs by pathway

topic_name: High-purity silica and specialty quartz (PV, semiconductor supply chains)
justification: Strategic relevance is high but commercial readiness is mixed

topic_name: High-purity copper and specialty alloys (beyond basic rod and wire)
justification: Attractive extension of copper chain with tighter quality barriers

topic_name: Defence-grade materials supply chains (qualified steels, armour inputs, magnets, Ti powders, qualified alloys)
justification: Strategic importance is high but market entry is slow

topic_name: Black mass import processing hub for Asia-Pacific
justification: Regional feedstock aggregation can create circular-processing scale

topic_name: Battery recycling and urban mining (domestic loop plus regional feedstock)
justification: Strategic resilience play with moderate export upside when scaled

topic_name: Specialty phosphates and purified phosphoric acid (non-fertiliser grades)
justification: Value-added extension of phosphate chain with selected high-value niches

topic_name: Specialty cobalt and nickel metal products (high-purity rounds, powders)
justification: Strategic specialty products with tighter route-to-market constraints

topic_name: Boron products and advanced borates (specialty chemicals)
justification: Niche specialty opportunity with moderate strategic impact

topic_name: Advanced refractories and furnace consumables (green iron, copper, alumina enablement)
justification: Useful enabling product set but limited export leverage

topic_name: High-performance carbon materials (synthetic graphite, needle coke, carbon fibres)
constraint_summary: High capex, process risk, and technology barriers
justification: Potentially valuable but high execution and competitiveness risk

topic_name: Green polysilicon (solar-grade, wafers over time)
constraint_summary: Extreme power intensity and global competition
justification: Strategic fit exists but near-term readiness is limited

topic_name: Titanium metal and powders (aerospace, defence, additive manufacturing)
justification: High-value market with slow and demanding entry pathway

topic_name: Indium recovery and refining (byproduct-led strategy)
constraint_summary: Limited byproduct scale and concentrated demand
justification: Strategic relevance remains but practical scale is constrained

topic_name: Bismuth refining and compounds (byproduct)
constraint_summary: Small market size and byproduct dependence
justification: Niche opportunity with lower portfolio impact

topic_name: Regional recycling hub services model (contracting, logistics, QA, compliance)
justification: Supportive circular service model with modest direct leverage

topic_name: Battery separator materials (specialty polymers)
constraint_summary: Incumbent lock-in and high qualification barriers
justification: Strategic relevance is high but entry risk is significant

topic_name: Battery binder materials (PVDF and alternatives)
constraint_summary: Complex chemistry scale-up and customer qualification
justification: Potential upside but low readiness for near-term scale

topic_name: Electrolyte solvents (DMC, EMC, DEC) and additive packages
constraint_summary: Chemical integration complexity and standards compliance
justification: Qualification-driven market with slower pathway to competitiveness

topic_name: Electrolyte formulation and qualification capability (OEM-facing)
justification: Important capability play but indirect and slower monetisation

topic_name: Anode and cathode precursor supply chain QA and metrology (reference materials, test protocols)
justification: Useful trust infrastructure with limited near-term export scale

topic_name: Strategic reserves and stockpile services (governance, storage, QA, financing)
constraint_summary: Policy design and inventory carrying cost
justification: Strategic resilience function with weak direct export upside

topic_name: Commodity finance and project finance capability packaged for green metals
constraint_summary: Capital market depth and policy certainty
justification: Important support capability but indirect export impact

topic_name: Subsea and cryogenic logistics supply chain (CO2, hydrogen carriers, ammonia terminals) leveraging LNG adjacency
constraint_summary: Very high capex and demand timing uncertainty
justification: Strong adjacency exists but sequencing and economics remain uncertain

topic_name: Industrial gases expansion tied to hubs (oxygen, nitrogen, argon; cryogenics)
constraint_summary: Demand depends on hub build-out sequence
justification: Critical enabler but not a primary export thesis

topic_name: Uranium value lift toward fuel-cycle services via partnerships (policy-gated)
constraint_summary: Domestic policy gate on fuel-cycle participation
justification: High strategic upside but policy settings currently cap near-term ranking

topic_name: Industrial water as a gating enabler for hubs (constraint item, not export thesis)
constraint_summary: Water availability, permitting, and desalination cost
justification: Essential site constraint and not a standalone export priority
